participant_1.background:
My favorite websites are those that help me learn more about asthma and how to manage it.
i also enjoy reading the game of thrones series books.
I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
i like listening to blues music.
I spend my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy.

participant_2.background:
I'd rather sleep in, but I do love spending time with my family.
i can run very fast for long distances.
i am proposing tonight.
I used to wear a suit every day to work.
i currently work at mcdonald.

content.text: Hello, hope you are having a good day!
Hello! I am, thank you! I am proposing to my girlfriend tonight and I am so excited!
Congratulations! I am sure she will say yes! What are your plans for after the proposal?
I am not sure yet, I am thinking of taking her to dinner and then we can go dancing.
That sounds perfect! I am sure it will be a night she never forgets!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I love running, I can run for long distances and I usually run around my neighborhood.
That is great! I wish I could run like that. I am more of a slow runner.
Everyone has their own pace, it is not about how fast you run but how far you can go.
Thank you! I like to stay positive.
